document_data.mainbody: ''knife''' was a unit of measurement used in cooking. One knife was defined as the amount of a substance that could balance atop the [[blade]] of a large chef's [[knife]].<ref group="note">One knife was approximately equal to {{SI|2|fl oz|ml|long=yes}}. It was used to measure gluey or sticky ingredients, such as fats.
document_data.Usage: The knife was used by chefs in the [[Dalelands]]. For example, the recipe for [[Stuffed Turkey Pie]] from the [[Watchful Eye]] in [[Essembra]] called for 4 knives of [[bacon]] fat to make the pastry dough.
